summary: Shinnosuke is introduced to Shizu as a prospective wife, but he falls in love with her widowed sister Oyu. Convention forbids Oyu to marry because she has to raise her son as the head of ... See full summary »
cast: Kinuyo Tanaka|Nobuko Otowa|Yûji Hori|Kiyoko Hirai|Reiko Kongô|Eijirô Yanagi|Eitarô Shindô|Kanae Kobayashi|Fumihiko Yokoyama|Jun Fujikawa|Sôji Shibata|Inosuke Kuhara|Ayuko Fujishiro|Shôzô Nanbu|Midori Komatsu|Sachiko Sôma|Sumao Ishihara
title: La señorita Oyu
